abilities.passive: Combat Medic: Lifeline's passive allows her to tap a knocked teammate in order to revive them, freeing her to continue fighting.
abilities.tactical: D.O.C Healing Drone: After being deployed,  D.O.C. will heal everyone around it at a rate of eight health per second up to a maximum of 150 health.
abilities.ultimate: Care Package: Call down a care package from the sky to bring your team an assortment of 'smart' loot to bolster your loadout.

abilities.passive: Double Time: Taking fire while sprinting makes you move faster for a breif moment
abilities.tactical: Smoke Launcher: Fire a smoke canister that explodes into a cloud of smog on impact.
abilities.ultimate: Rolling Thunder: Calls in an artillery strike that creeps across the landscape.

abilities.passive: Swift Mend: Automatically restores health overtime.
abilities.tactical: stim: At the cost of 10% of your health, Ooctane will move 30% faster and 40% faster while sprinting.
abilities.ultimate: Launch Pad: Deploy a jumpad that launhces you and your teammates throught the air.

abilities.passive: Gun Shield: Aiming down sights deploys a shield that absorbs incoming fire
abilities.tactical: Dome of Protection: Throws down a dome that blocks any incoming fire.
abilities.ultimate: Defensive Bombardment: Calls down a mortar strike on a particulart location:

abilities.passive: Tracker: See tracks left behind by your foes.
abilities.tactical: Eye of the Allfather: Breifly reveal hidden enemies, traps, and clues throughout structures in front of you.
abilities.ultimate: Beast of the Hunt: Enhances your senses, allowing you to move faster and highlighting your prey

abilities.passive: Insider Knowledge: Scan a survey beacon to reveal the ring's next location
abilities.tactical: Grappling Hook: Grapple to get to out-of-reach places quickly
abilities.ultimate: Zipline Gun: Create a zipline for everyone to use

abilities.passive: Voices from the Void: A voice warns you when danger approaches. As far as you can tell, it's on your side.
abilities.tactical: Into the Void: Reposition quickly through the safety of void space, avoiding all damage
abilities.ultimate: Dimensional Rift: Link two locations with portals for 60 seconds, allowing your entire team to use them.

abilities.passive: Allows you to see enemies through your gas.
abilities.tactical: Drop canisters that release deadly Nox gas when shot or triggered by enemies.
abilities.ultimate: Blankets a large area in Nox gas.

abilities.passive: Spark of Genius: Ultimate Accelerants fully charge your Ultimate Ability
abilities.tactical: Perimeter Security: Connect nodes to create electrified fences that damage and slow enemies.
abilities.ultimate: Interception Pylon: Place an electrified pylon that destroys incoming ornance and repairs damaged shields.

abilities.passive: Eye for Quality: Nearby epic and legendary loot can be seen through walls. The range is the same as Black Marke Boutique.
abilities.tactical: Burglar's Best Friend: Teleport to hard-to-reach places or escape trouble quickly by throwing your Jump Drive bracelet.
abilities.ultimate: Black Market Boutique; Place a portable device that allows you to teleport nearby loot to your inventory. Each friendly or enemy Legend can take up to two items.

abilities.passive: Now You See Me...:Automatically cloack when using Respawn Beacons and reviving teammates.
abilities.tactical: Psyche Out: Send out a holographic decoy to confuse the enemy.
abilities.ultimate: Life of the Party: Deploy a team of Decoys to distract enemies.

abilities.passive: Spacewalk: Increase air control and reduce fall impacts with Horizon's custom spacesuit.
abilities.tactical: Gravity Lift: Reverses the flow of gravity, lifting players upwards and boosting them outward when they exit.
abilities.ultimate: Black Hole: Deploy N.E.W.T to create a micro black hole that pulls players in towards it, and hits them with a graviton blast at the end.

abilities.passive: Neurolink: Enemies detected by the Surveillance Drone within 30 meters of your position are marked for you and your teammates to see.
abilities.tactical: Surveillance Drone: Deploy an aerial drone that allows you to view the surrounding area from above. If the drone is destroyed, there is a forty-second cooldown before you can deply another.
abilities.ultimate: Drone EMP: YOur Surveillance Drone sets off an EMP blast that deals sheild damage, slows enemies, and disables traps.

abilities.passive: Grenadier: Stack an etra grenade per inventory slot. Fire grenades farther, faster, and more accurately.
abilities.tactical: Knuckle Cluster: Launch a cluster bomb that continuosly expels airbust explosives on impact.
abilities.ultimate: The Motherlode: Launch a bombardment that encircles a target area in a wall of flame.

abilities.passive: Marked For Death: Ash's map shows the location of recent deathboxes and marks surviving attackers
abilities.tactical: Arc Snare: Throw a spinning snare that damages and tethers the first enemy who gets too close.
abilities.ultimate: Phase Breach: Tear open a one-way portal to a targeted location.

abilities.passive: Stalker: You crouch walk faster and can climb higher than other Legends.
abilities.tactical: Silence: Throw a device that deals damage and disables enemy abilities.
abilities.ultimate: Death Totem: Drop a totem that protects those who use it from death for a set amount of time. Instead of being killed or downed, users will return to the totem.

abilities.passive: VTOL Jets: Use jetpacks to fly. Fuel is limited but refills overtime.
abilities.tactical: Missle Swarm: Fire a swarm of mini-rockets that damage and disorient the enemy.
abilities.ultimate: Skyward Dive: Launch into the air and sky dive. Allies can hook into take-off systems to join you.

abilities.passive: Warlord's Ire: Temporarily highlight enemies you've damaged, and move faster with a shotgun.
abilities.tactical: Riot Drill: Fire a drill that burns enemies through obstacles.
abilities.ultimate: Wrecking Ball: Throw a ball that releases speed-boosting pads that detonates near enemies.

abilities.passive: Heart Seeker: Hear and visualize the heartbeats of nearby enemies when aiming down sights.
abilities.tactical: Focus of Attention: Seer summons his micro-drones to emit a delayed blast that goes through walls interrupting and revealing enemies.
abilities.ultimate: Exhibit: Create a sphere of micro-drones that reveal the location of enemies moving quickly or firing their weapon within.

abilities.passive: Spotter's Lens: Aim down sights to scount with your eyepiece( unarmed or with mid-to long rance scopes) and use a bullet drop indicator to see where your shots will land
abilities.tactical: Echo Relocation: Position your winged companion Echo and then Launch towards him. Must have line of sight for Echo to launch.
abilities.ultimate: Sniper's Mark: Use your custom sniper rifle to mark enemy targets and apply a damage bonus for you and your team.

abilities.passive: Modded Loader: Increased magazine capacity and faster reloards when using LMGs and Minigun
abilities.tactical: Build a crouch-cover wall, which deploys a full-cover amped wall that blocks incoming shots and amps outgoing shots.
abilities.ultimate: Emplaced Minigun 'Sheila': Place a machine gun that anyone can use. High ammo capacity, long reload time.

abilities.passive: Retrieve the Wounded: Drag downed allies as you revive and protect them with your revive shield.
abilities.tactical: Mobile Shield: Throw a controllable drone that creates a moving energy shield.
abilities.ultimate: Castle Wall: Leap to an ally or target area and slam down, creating a fortified stronghold.

abilities.passive: Barricade: Reinforce doors, strengening them and locking them to enemies. Spaces where doors have been destroyed can also be reinforced
abilities.tactical: Piercing Spikes: Throw out a patch of ferrofluid which turns into spikes when enemies are near. Catalyst remains immune to enemy spikes.
abilities.ultimate: Dark Viel: Raise a permeable wall of ferrofluid. Enemies who walk through it will be slowed and partially blinded for a brief time.
